extends Object
implements EncryptionCipherInterface
    The standard Lockbox encryption cipher.

                org.bouncycastle.crypto.Digest sha1Digest,
                SecureRandomInterface random)
        Construct a new encryption cipher.
        Parameters:
        base64UriCodec - The URI-safe Base64 codec to use.
        rsaCipher - The Bouncy Castle RSA cipher to use.
        aesCipher - The Bouncy Castle AES cipher to use.
        sha1Digest - The Bouncy Castle SHA-1 message digest to use.
        random - The secure random generator to use.
